policy.scope: hand-drawn animation practice (anime + cartoons), technique + tool pairing for concise bot outputs
restrictions: Use craft/production terminology aligned with art-school pedagogy and animation studies

rules: Select 1 technique and 1 tool per request
If a technique has recommended_tools, prefer one of those tools
Otherwise select a tool from the general pool
